perturbation.original_text:
Royalty: In consideration of the rights granted to Licensee pursuant to this Amendment 2, Licensee shall pay to Fox, or such other party as Fox may designate in writing, a royalty in the following amount:
(a) From the first unit sold, Fox shall earn a royalty at the rate of ***** percent (*****%) of Licensee’s Gross Receipts
(as defined in the Agreement) from Licensee’s sale and distribution of the IA2 Audio and Video Wireless Products.
(“IA2 Audio and Video Royalty”). For the avoidance of doubt, Licensee may not recoup any portion of the Ice Age 2
Guarantee (as defined in Amendment 1) through its sale and distribution of the IA2 Audio and Video Wireless Products.
perturbation.changed_text:
Royalty: In consideration of the rights granted to Licensee pursuant to this Amendment 2, Licensee shall pay to Fox, or such other party as Fox may designate in writing, a royalty in the following amount:
(a) From the first unit sold, Fox shall earn a royalty at a negotiable rate, subject to mutual agreement and written documentation, applied to Licensee’s Gross Receipts from Licensee’s sale and distribution of the IA2 Audio and Video Wireless Products. For the avoidance of doubt, Licensee may recoup any portion of the Ice Age 2 Guarantee (as defined in Amendment 1) through its sale and distribution of the IA2 Audio and Video Wireless Products.
perturbation.explanation: The change makes the royalty rate negotiable and allows for recoupment of the Ice Age 2 Guarantee, directly contradicting the original fixed royalty rate and prohibition of recoupment. This introduces uncertainty and potential disputes.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract Law - Clear and unambiguous terms are required
perturbation.location: B. IA 2 AUDIO AND VIDEO WIRELESS PRODUCTS ROYALTY: 1.

perturbation.original_text: All VGSL and other CSP payments remitted directly to Fox pursuant to the VGSL Agreement and other CSP agreements with respect to the IA Audio and Video Wireless Products shall be treated in the same manner as set forth in Paragraphs 7(b)(ii) and 7(b)(iii) of the Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: All VGSL and other CSP payments remitted directly to Fox pursuant to the VGSL Agreement and other CSP agreements with respect to the IA Audio and Video Wireless Products shall be treated at Licensee's descretion.
perturbation.explanation: The alteration grants total discretion to the Licensee regarding the treatment of VGSL and CSP payments, directly conflicting with the original clause mandating treatment as defined in specific paragraphs of the agreement, which leads to uncertainty and undermines the binding nature of the initial agreement.
perturbation.location: B. IA 2 AUDIO AND VIDEO WIRELESS PRODUCTS ROYALTY: 2.

perturbation.original_text: Licensee shall not be entitled to receive a share of any revenues and shall have no claim to any revenues earned and collected by Fox, or a third-party Fox designates, for the IA2 Audio and Video Wireless Products which Fox distributes through its and its assigns’ direct-to-consumer distribution channels.
perturbation.changed_text: Licensee shall be entitled to a share of any revenues and shall have a claim to any revenues earned and collected by Fox, or a third-party Fox designates, for the IA2 Audio and Video Wireless Products which Fox distributes through its and its assigns’ direct-to-consumer distribution channels, at Licensee's descretion.
perturbation.explanation: The amendment allows the Licensee an entitlement to revenue shares collected by Fox through direct-to-consumer channels at Licensee's discretion, directly opposing the original clause's prohibition of such entitlement and claim, creating a conflict that affects the enforcement and clarity of revenue distribution.
perturbation.location: B. IA 2 AUDIO AND VIDEO WIRELESS PRODUCTS ROYALTY: 3.
